<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The pgo-specific indirect call promotion function declared below is used by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the pgo-driven indirect call promotion and sample profile passes. It&#39;s a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wrapper around llvm::promoteCall, et al. that additionally computes !prof</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// metadata. We place it in a pgo namespace so it&#39;s not confused with the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generic utilities.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pgo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pgo">pgo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper function that transforms CB (either an indirect-call instruction, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an invoke instruction , to a conditional call to F. This is like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     if (Inst.CalledValue == F)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        F(...);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        Inst(...);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TotalCount is the profile count value that the instruction executes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Count is the profile count value that F is the target function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// These two values are used to update the branch weight.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If \\p AttachProfToDirectCall is true, a prof metadata is attached to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new direct call to contain \\p Count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the promoted direct call instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pgo/#ac3ab1f99a5d99ba23fcfec6044ebc805">promoteIndirectCall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &amp;CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              uint64&#95;t TotalCount, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AttachProfToDirectCall,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/optimizationremarkemitter">OptimizationRemarkEmitter</a> &#42;ORE);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace pgo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Options for the frontend instrumentation based profiling pass.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Calculate what to divide by to scale counts.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given the maximum count, calculate a divisor that will scale all the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// weights to strictly less than std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;::max().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abb99891c63212832f13146f418aed935"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abb99891c63212832f13146f418aed935">calculateCountScale</a>(uint64&#95;t MaxCount) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxCount &lt; std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;::max()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">             ? 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">             : MaxCount / std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;::max() + 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Scale an individual branch count.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Scale a 64-bit weight down to 32-bits using \\c Scale.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa9a2cc174301c011647c95c88e0f89b0"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa9a2cc174301c011647c95c88e0f89b0">scaleBranchCount</a>(uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>, uint64&#95;t Scale) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> / Scale;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a> &lt;= std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;::max() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;overflow 32-bits&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arc/arcinstrinfo-cpp/#a5d6e37f3d036496321824378223ad718a8009351707fa969013ab5d9126bab03e">Scaled</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use to ensure the inserted instrumentation has a DebugLocation; if none is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// attached to the source instruction, try to use a DILocation with offset 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scoped to surrounding function (if it has a DebugLocation).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some non-call instructions may be missing debug info, but when inserting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instrumentation calls, some builds (e.g. LTO) want calls to have debug info</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if the enclosing function does.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrumentationirbuilder"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrumentationirbuilder/#a448f037b3ebf53dbba70a9ce7a89cad4">InstrumentationIRBuilder</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder/#afdcde0e677ccb2ad5b4d67a510da2972">IRBuilder</a>&lt;&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>
